rooms.description: A spacious and welcoming entrance leading into the central courtyard.
An open-plan living area adjacent to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
A dedicated dining space with views towards the central courtyard.
Well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances and a small pantry area.
Compact living space for the servant, ensuring privacy while staying close to service areas.
A comfortable guest room with en-suite bathroom.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door design complementing the Kerala style.
Large windows to enhance natural light, align with Vastu for prosperity.

openings.location: Rooftop Terrace access from the living area
openings.description: Provides ventilation and a private outdoor space.

central_courtyard.description: A serene central courtyard with water features and greenery, acting as the heart of the Nalukettu design.

rooftop_terrace.description: Luxury rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and open space for relaxation.

irregular_plot_adaptations.description: Design integrates irregular plot dimensions through strategic placement of rooms, preserving balance and harmony as per Vastu principles.
